Bathié is 40 years old.  He is married and has a family.  He has come to settle in the city with his family, whom he takes very good care of.

Bathié started working in retail business a long time ago.  He has a shop, not far from the (microfinance) institution, and he spends his whole day there, from 7 o'clock in the morning until 11 o'clock at night.

He has more than 7 years of experience in retail business.  He is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs which will be used to boost his business.  This loan will allow him to make more profits, which will in turn help him to regularly save some money and to better provide for his family.

Bathié's dream is to become a wholesaler one day.

loans.use: to buy food supplies for his shop.

loans.name: Juman Group

texts.en:
Juman Group is made up of 9 members who are all women and sell the following commodities: provisions, beans, chicken, plastic products, fruits, vegetables, fish, underwear and detergents. They have been together as a group since 2009. Five members are on their fifth loan; two members are on their fourth loan; one person is on her second loan; and one person is on her first loan. They meet every Thursday to discuss business and pay loans. This group is in the eastern part of the town.

Charllote is a 43-year-old trader married to a 49-year-old driver, and they have a 19-year-old girl. She operates a small cold store and a provision shop where she sells fruits, vegetables, chicken, meat, fish, rice, sugar and sardines. She paid back her previous loan amount of 700 Ghana cedis successfully, and now she needs 900 Ghana cedis to stock her shop by buying more provisions, meat and fish. This is her fifth loan cycle with ID-Ghana, and she is very loyal to the microfinance institution. She has been reinvesting her profit that she makes from sales.

They need a total amount of 4,800 Ghana cedis to be able to buy more commodities.

loans.use: To buy more fruits, vegetables, provisions, meat and fish.

loans.name: Abdoul

texts.fr: Abdoul est un homme marié.Il est père de trois enfants dont les deux fréquentent l'école.Depuis plusieurs années, il tient un commerce de matériel de construction (ciment, plomberie...) dans une quincaillerie.Ce commerce ui rapporte des revenus assez substantiels qui lui permettent de prendre en charge les dépenses d'entretien de sa famille ainsi que ses propres besoins.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter du ciment.Son ambition est d'ouvrir d'autres quincaillerie.
texts.en:
Abdoul is a married man.  He is the father of three children, two of whom attend school.  

For several years now, he has been selling building materials (cement, plumbing supplies...) inside a hardware store.

This business brings him a good income and he is able to cover his family expenses and to meet his own needs.

In order to boost his business, he is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs for the purchase of cement.  His ambition is to open other hardware stores.

loans.use: to buy cement.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy local products and fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr: Awa est une femme mariée qui exerce un commerce de tissus teints "ganila" et "thioub simple".Elle est mère de trois enfants. Elle a en charge leur nourriture, leur habillement et leur soins sanitaires.Elle sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter des balles de tissus pour maximiser ses bénéfices à un mois de la fête de "tabaski".
texts.en: Awa is a married woman who has a business selling the dyed fabrics "ganila" and simple "bazin". She is the mother of 3 children. She is responsible for feeding and clothing them as well as for their health care. She is requesting a loan of 500 000 francs with which to buy bales of fabric, so that she can maximise her profits one month before the festival of Tabaski.

loans.use: to buy bales of fabric.

loans.name: Abdou

texts.fr: Abdou exerce un commerce de produits cosmétiques dans sa cantine située près de la gare routière de sa localité.Il est célibataire sans enfants.Il supporte toutefois avec les revenus de  son commerce, l'essentiel des dépenses d'entretien de sa famille(ses deux parents , ses frères et sœurs).Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 225 000f pour acheter des produits cosmétiques.Son ambition est de faire des voyages de commerce en chine.
texts.en:
Abdou sells cosmetic products in a booth located next to the bus station of his locality.  He is single, with no children.

However, he uses his income to take care of his two parents, his brothers and sisters, and he covers most of their daily living expenses.

In order to boost his business, he is requesting a loan of 225,000 francs for the purchase of cosmetic products.

His ambition is to go on business trips to China.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products.

loans.name: Matar

texts.fr: Notre emprunteur s’appelle Matar, il fait de l’embouche bovine depuis plus de 30 ans maintenant. Il a pratiquement fait cela durant toute sa vie ,l’ayant hérité de ses parents. Matar loge dans un petit village ou il fait son activité d'embouche. Il est à son 3ème crédit à l’IMCEC  et souhaite renouveler un montant de 250000 F CFA,  afin de pouvoir acheter 2 bœufs, qu’il va élever pendant 7 à 8 mois avant de le revendre. Matar a toujours nourri sa famille avec les revenus de son activité ; c’est pourquoi, il désire augmenter son fond afin de pouvoir donner un départ aussi à son fils ainé en lui ouvrant une boutique d’alimentation générale. Compte fait, ce dernier pourra l’aider dans les autres charges de la maison.
texts.en:
Our borrower's name is Matar.  He has been fattening cattle for more than 30 years now.  Cattle-fattening is an activity he has been involved in for almost all his life, having learned it from his parents.

Matar lives in a little village.  This is his third loan with UIMCEC, and he is requesting a new loan of 250,000 CFA francs in order to buy two oxen that he will raise for seven to eight months before reselling them.

Matar has always provided for his family with the income he gets from his business.  This is why he would now like to boost his activity in order to be able to give a start in life to his oldest son,  by opening a grocery store for him.  

Once his son has his own business, he will be able to help his father with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy two oxen that he will raise and resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy personal care products, hardware products, candies, natural products and baking supplies

loans.name: Frechielyn

texts.en:
Frechielyn is a married woman and a mother of two young children from Bohol, Philippines. She and her husband have been in the rice farming business for some time now. This is the source of their income. Frechielyn is in need of additional funds for their business. She is asking for a loan worth 5,000 PHP to buy fertilizers for the plants. With this, she will be able to grow healthy rice.

Frechielyn hopes to expand the business so that it will continue to generate income for the family. Moreover, she wants to save for future schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the plants.

loans.name: Pharat

texts.en:
Pharat is 29 years old. She is married and resides with her two children in Kratie Province, Cambodia.

She has been selling groceries for more than two years, earning approximately $10 a day. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) is a farmer who earns about $8 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Pharat is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase more groceries to resell. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to use the profits to expand her business and send her children to good schools. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to resell.

loans.name: Shavkat

texts.ru: Шавкат- молодой парень, женат и имеет одну дочку.   Живет за городом и занимается откормом скота на дому.  Он в основном откармливает баранов и овец.  Корм покупает по оптовой цене.  В сельской местности "животноводство" является основным занятием жителей.  Шавкат в свободное время занимается строительными работами по заказу и имеет ежедневную выручку. На полученный кредит он  решил получить кредит  и увеличить поголовье скота, хочет откормить их до национального  праздника Курбан, когда все закупают  скот по традиции на жертвоприношение.   Он надеется получить прибыль и таким образом увеличить свои активы.   Рад, что сотрудничает с нами.
texts.en:
Shavkat is a young, married man with two daughters. He lives outside of the city where he fattens livestock at his home. He mostly fattens rams and ewes, and he buys the feed for wholesale prices. 

In this rural location, residents mostly work in animal husbandry. Shavkat also works in construction on a contact basis in his free time, and this provides him with daily earnings. 

Shavkat decided to request this loan in order to increase the amount of livestock he owns. He wants to fatten them until the national holiday Kurban, when everyone traditionally buys livestock to sacrifice. He hopes to make a profit that will increase his assets. He is happy to be working with you!

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Amgalan

texts.en:
Mr. Amgalan, 51, is a taxi driver, and he is taking a loan to complete his new house building. He has been operating his taxi business for seven years nonstop and he has gained a lot of experience in it. All of his children moved out and now he lives with his wife in a ger, a nomadic Mongolian traditional yurt in Ulaanbaatar, which is the capital city of Mongolia. His wife is a teacher. He is planning to add insulation to the walls, and it will be helpful to cut the usage of the coal-fired furnace and to live warmer at home. He is also planning to insulate the roof hollow due to the heat loss through it. 

So he is requesting a loan to pay for the building materials such as foam, rock wool, and cement to make the insulation for his new family house.

loans.use: to pay for the building materials such as foam, rock wool, and cement for making the insulation to his new family house.

loans.name: Sok Laun

texts.en:
Sok Laun (pictured with her husband and her children) is 34 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kratie Province, Cambodia.

She has been selling dessert for more than two years, earning approximately $8 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $8 a day. In order to increase her family’s income, Sok Laun is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase a walking tractor to run a tilling service. This purchase will help her generate additional income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelors degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a walking tractor to run a tilling service.

loans.name: Sok Khon

texts.en:
Sok Khon is 51 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is involved in growing lotus and earns about $10 a day. Two of her children are employed in a hotel. They earn about $7 each day. 

Sok Khon wants to build a new house. With this goal in mind, Sok Khon is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase timbers and zinc to build her house. In addition, part of this money is used to pay for the construction service. This money would enable her to provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to help her children earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to purchase timbers and zinc to build her house.

loans.name: Srey Mom

texts.en:
Srey Mom is 28 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling fish for more than four years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $4 per day. 

Srey Mom is requesting a loan of $900 to purchase construction materials to fix the walls of her house. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to fix the walls of her house.

loans.name: Batjargal

texts.en: Mr. Batjargal, 40, is a carpenter and he is requesting his next loan. This time he needs some support to make repairs to his old apartment. He lives with his wife and his two children in an apartment in Darkhan, which is the second largest city in Mongolia. Lately his apartment's rooms have heat loss through its bad windows, which were made in the socialist era many years ago. They were damaged a lot and have chips everywhere. In winter he uses a small coal or wood fired furnace in his kitchen heat the rooms. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to covering the cost of the new double glazed windows to his apartment.

loans.use: to purchase decoration and building materials to repair his apartment.

loans.name: Thain

texts.en:
Thain is 61 years old. She is a widow and resides with one child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been involved in growing rice and making creel (a type of basket) to sell for more than twenty years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her child helps her making creel and baskets to sell, and earns about $4 each day. 

Thain cannot access fresh water. Therefore, Thain is requesting a loan of $300 to pay for the expenses of digging a well. By doing so, she would be able to have enough water to use in her daily living. 

In the future, she would like to run an additional business which involves animal husbandry, and rebuild her house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to pay for the expenses of digging the well

loans.name: Chantha

texts.en:
Chantha is 48 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling groceries and all kinds of drinks for more than five years, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband sells boats. He earns about $6 a day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Chantha is requesting a loan of $1,500 to increase capital in her husband's business so that he can purchase more boats to resell. This money will help him generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to build a new house and help her children earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to raise capital in her husband's business so that he can purchase more boats to resell.

loans.name: Nara

texts.en:
Nara is 42 years old. She is married and lives with her three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $10 a day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Nara is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money she can save on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to purchase rice to store in a warehouse and resell when the price is higher, and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she plans to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Samay

texts.en:
Samay is 40 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been working as a teacher for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 a day. Her husband runs a washing shop. He earns about $5 a day. One of her children is a garment worker who earns about $5 each day. 

Samay is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase equipment for her husband to use for washing cars. This money will help her husband run the business smoothly. In the future, she would like to sell groceries from home and help her children earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for her husband to use for washing cars.

loans.name: Oyuntsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Oyuntsetseg, 41, runs a noodle house, and she has been operating it since last year. Her noodle house is located at a nearby primary school. In a day she has approximately 20-25 customers and most of them are satisfied for her made bowls of noodles. She lives with her husband and her two kids in the apartment in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has a lot of customers from September to June every year during the academic year.  

So she wanted to increase her working capital such as noodles and dinner services. The loan she is taking will be used to pay for the uncooked noodles and renewing dinner services.

loans.use: to pay for uncooked noodles and renewing dinner services.

loans.name: Mavzuna

texts.ru: Мавзуна  энергичная женщина с высшим образованием но по семейным обстоятельством она работает не по специальности.   Она торгует на вещевом рынке, женской одеждой.    У неё хороший ассортимент и товар пользуется большим спросом.   Мавзуна наша клиентка почти уже 10 лет и самая лояльная среди клиентов,она непрерывно пользуется нашими услугами и всегда целенаправленно использует кредит по назначению.   у неё трое взрослых сыновей-двоё из них близнецы,   которые окончили школу и поступили в вуз.   Сейчас у Мавзуны много семейных расходов и она с мужем работают усердно,чтобы покрыть эти расходы.  Очередной кредит запрашивает на закуп оптовой партии школьной одежды, так как  начинается учебный год.  Благодарит нашу организацию за помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Mavzuna is an energetic woman. She has a higher education degree, but because of family circumstances, she does not work in her field. She sells women's clothes in a market. She has a nice selection, and her goods are on high demand. 

Mavzuna has been our client for more than 10 years, and she is the most loyal of our clients. She continuously uses our services, and she always uses the loan for the intended purpose. 

She has three grown sons, two of which are twins who have finished school and started university study. 

Mavzuna has many family expenses right now. She and her husband work tirelessly to cover all of these expenses. She is requesting this loan to purchase wholesale school clothes, as the school year is starting soon. She thanks your organization for the assistance and support.

loans.use: to buy shcool clothes

loans.name: Rom Doul

texts.en:
Rom Doul is 30 years old. She is married and blessed with two children. She lives in Takeo Province, Cambodia. 

She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up animals for more than seven years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband runs a business of purchasing motorcycles to resell. He earns about $12 a day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Rom Doul is requesting a loan of $1,500 to raise capital in her husband's business, so that he can purchase more motorcycles to resell. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to raise capital in her husband's business, so that he can purchase more motorcycles to resell.

loans.name: Rina

texts.en: Mrs. Rina, 41, is a cook and works in the cafeteria in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been doing her job for two years. Before she used to work in the restaurant as a chef. She lives with her husband and her daughter in the ger district, an area of the city with no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity. Her husband is a driver, and he is now unemployed. Therefore, he wanted start a new business such as a taxi business, as he said it will be a big contribution for his family to increase their income further. He and Rina planned to buy a car that has an electric engine, which is called a Toyota for their new business. It will not create any toxic smoke to the air. The loan she is requesting will be used to cover the cost of a electric car for her husband starting a taxi business.

loans.use: to cover the cost of an electric car for her husband to start a taxi business.

loans.name: Reth

texts.en:
Reth is 48 years old. She is from Takeo Province, Cambodia, married, and blessed with one child. Reth has been selling grilled chicken for more than three years, earning approximately $4 each day. Her husband is a fisherman who earns about $4 daily. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Reth is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase more chicken to grill and sell. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more chicken to grill and sell

loans.name: Vanna

texts.en:
Vanna is 47 years old. She is from Takeo Province, Cambodia, married, and blessed with four children. Vanna has been selling grilled chicken for more than 10 years, earning approximately $7 per day. Her husband is a rice farmer who earns about $1 daily. Three of her children are employed. They earn about $15 each day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Vanna is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money from her transportation expenses to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Neth

texts.en:
Neth is 30 years old. She is married and resides with one child in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in weaving Krama (sturdy traditional Cambodian garments) for more than 7 years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $3 each day. 

In order to improve her business, Neth is requesting a loan of $900 to purchase more silk threads to use for weaving. This money will help her make more Kramas to sell and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her child to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more silk theads to use for weaving

loans.name: Saroeurn

texts.en:
Saroeurn is 42 years old. She is widowed and resides with four siblings in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up animals for more than ten years. In addition, she runs a grocery store at home. She earns about $3 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Saroeurn is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase more groceries to sell. By doing so, she would be able to generate more profit to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Abduhamid

texts.ru: Абдухамид ответственный,трудолюбивый, мужчина в возрасте 63лет,женат.   Абдухамит 40 лет работал преподавателем в школе а на данный момент он пенсионер.   Своим честном трудом он поставил на ноги своих пятерых детей и дал высшее образование.    Так как сейчас у него есть свободное время чтобы заняться бизнесом,он решил возле дома открыть магазин где  продает продукты питания и хоз товары.   По бизнесу ему помогает его жена.   Абдухамид хочет расширить свой товарооборот и на полученный кредит хочет закупить продукты питания и хозяйственные товары.
texts.en:
Abduhamid is a responsible and hard-working man of 63. He is married. Abduhamid worked as a school teacher for 40 years, but is now retired. Through honest work, he raised his five children and made sure they all got higher education. Since he now has free time to operate a business, Abduhamid has decided to open a shop near his home, where he sells food and household goods. His wife helps him with the business.

Abduhamid would like to increase his merchandise turnover and wants to use this loan to stock more food products and household goods.

loans.use: to buy food and household products for his shop

loans.name: Mirzokadam

texts.ru:
Мирзокадам житель города Куляб. Ему 30 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Жена Мирзокадама домохозяйка. Сам Мирзокадам имеет средне - специальное образование. У него имеется мастерская, где он занимается починкой музыкальных инструментов. Также Мирзокадам дает в аренду музыкальные инструменты. Этим видом деятельности он занимается шесть лет. 
Мирзокадам просит кредит для приобретения новых музыкальных инструментов и запчастей.
texts.en:
Mirzokadam lives in the city of Kulob. He is 30 years old, married, and has three children. His wife takes care of the household. Mirzokadam has a vocational degree. He runs his own shop where he repairs musical instruments and also rents them out. He has been engaged in this activity for the past six years.

Mirzokadam is requesting a loan to purchase new musical instruments and spare parts.

loans.use: to buy new musical instruments and parts for his repair shop

loans.name: Nargiz

texts.ru: Nargiz was 38 years old. She is married and has 3 children. Nargiz needs 1700 (AZN) Azerbaijani New Manat for  to buy some calves for improving hiss business in future. She has been in this cattle breeding business 5 years. She it breeds only cows. Nargiz is an Internally Displaced Person (IDP) from Fizuli town. Nargiz and her family now live in Fizuli region. She needs to increase monthly income for her family.
texts.en:
Nargiz is 38 years old. She is married and has 3 children. Presently, she needs 1700 AZN to buy a few calves in order to improve her business. Nargiz has been in the cattle breeding business for the past 5 years, and only breeds cows.

Nargiz is an internally displaced person (IDP) from the city of Fizuli and presently lives with her family in the Fizuli region. She needs to increase her family's monthly income.

loans.use: to buy calves for her cattle breeding business

loans.name: Zaynurbi

texts.ru:
Зайнурби жительница города Куляб. Ей 50 лет. Она вдова. У нее четверо детей. Сын Зайнурби работает в городе Душанбе. Сама Зайнурби работает на рынке. Она готовит и продает пирожки, бутерброды, кофе. Также она дома готовит первые национальные блюда и приносит на рынок. Этим видом деятельности Зайнурби занимается 12 лет. Она на протяжении 12 лет одна зарабатывает и воспитывает детей. 
Зайнурби просит кредит для покупки продуктов и приобретения необходимой посуды.
texts.en: Zaynurbi lives in the city of Kulob. She is 50 years old, widowed, and has four children. Her son works in the city of Dushanbe, while Zaynurbi works at a market in Kulob. She prepares and sells small pies, sandwiches and coffee. Additionally, she cooks traditional dishes at home and brings them to the market. Zaynurbi has been doing this for the past 12 years, earning an income and raising her children alone. She is requesting this loan to purchase ingredients for her food, as well as necessary cookware and dishes.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients and cookware for her food stall

loans.name: Rajamo

texts.ru:
Рачамо 47 - летняя женщина проживающая в городе Душанбе. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Муж Рачамо работает поваром. Ее сын находится на заработках в Российской Федерации.
Рачамо занимается торговлей на рынке. Она в основном занимается торговлей детской и подростковой школьной одежды. Этим видом деятельности она занимается десять лет. Рачамо просит кредит для покупки осенней детской одежды.
texts.en:
Rajamo is a 47-year-old woman who lives in the city of Dushanbe. She is married and has five children. Rajamo's husband works as a cook, while their son has left to find work in Russia. Rajamo is a merchant at the market and mainly sells school clothes for children and teenagers. This has been her occupation for the past ten years.

Rajamo is requesting this loan to purchase children's fall clothing.

loans.use: to buy children's fall clothing for her shop

loans.name: Chan Thol

texts.en:
Chan Thol, age 45, has worked in a garment factory for over four years. She earns about $3 daily. She lives with her husband and their two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. Her husband (shown with her in the picture) runs a business of buying, repairing, and reselling second-hand motorcycles. He earns about $3 per day from this venture. One of her children is employed in a pure drinking water factory and also earns about $3 per day. 

Chan Thol is requesting a loan of $600 in order for her husband to be able to purchase a second-hand motorcycle to repair and offer for resale. 

In the future, she would like to expand the business and build a new house for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a second-hand motorcycle to repair and offer for resale

loans.name: La

texts.en:
La, age 23, sells groceries to earn a living. She has run her business for over a year and earns about $2 daily. She and her husband have one child and live in Takeo Province, Cambodia. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $3 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, La is requesting a loan of $300 to purchase more grocery items to offer for sale. By doing so, she is confident that she will be able to make more profit in order to better financially support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her store and be able to send her child to a good school. She also hopes to build a new house for the family as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to offer for sale

loans.name: Thy

texts.en:
Thy, age 51, grows rice and fattens cattle to earn her living. She earns about $3 daily and has been engaged in this work for 20 years. She and her husband have four children and live in Takeo Province, Cambodia. 

Her husband (shown with her in the picture) is a construction worker who earns about $4 each day. Two of their children are grown and are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $7 daily. 

Thy is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a plot of land to resell at a profitable price. In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land to resell at a profitable price

loans.name: Chreb

texts.en:
Chreb, age 30, is a farmer. She has been growing agricultural crops and vegetables for more than seven years, earning approximately $8 daily. Her husband helps her run the business. They live with their two children in Kandal Province, Cambodia.  

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Chreb is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase a motorcycle to use for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to purchase vegetables in the village to sell at the market for additional income. She also hopes to be able to send her children to a good school. Moreover, she plans to build a new house for the family as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to use for commuting

loans.name: Bunthain

texts.en:
Bunthain, age 32, is a farmer. She has been cultivating agricultural crops and vegetables for more than eight years, earning approximately $6 daily. She and her husband have two children and live in Kandal Province, Cambodia. Her husband is a farm worker who earns about $8 each day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Bunthain is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase a motorcycle to use for commuting. She will be able to reduce transportation expenses as a result. In addition, a portion of this money will be used to buy dirt to fill up her farmland. 

In the future, she would like to purchase vegetables in the village to resell at the market for additional income. Her goal is to help her children earn their Bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house for the family as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to use for commuting

loans.name: Sarin

texts.en:
Sarin is 42 years old. She is married and resides with her three children in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in embroidery work for more than six years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is a mechanic who earns about $3 each day. Two of her children are employed. They earn about $7 per day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sarin is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase cloth to be used in her embroidery work. By doing so, she will earn more income to support the family. In the future, Sarin would like to expand her business and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more cloth to use in her emboidery work

loans.name: Kunthea

texts.en:
Kunthea is 36 years old. She is married and lives with her parents and two children in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She has been working in garment factory for more than two years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband (who is shown in the picture) is involved in cultivating rice and fattening up cattle. He earns about $4 each day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Kunthea is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase more cattle to resell for a profitable price. By doing so, she will be able to financially support the family better. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she plans to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle for resale

loans.name: Chanthorn

texts.en:
Chanthorn is 30 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She has been selling Khmer noodles for more than a year, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is employed in a garment factory. He earns about $3 each day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Chanthorn is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase more noodles to resell. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more noodles for resale

loans.name: Zenayda

texts.es:
Zenayda de 48 años de edad es casada, tiene 3 hijos dos mayores de edad y uno menor que estudia su educacion primaria, los mayores le apoyan con los gastos del hogar; Doña Zenayda labora para la Municipaliad de Juigalpa  desde hace veinticuatro años actualmente se desempeña como Responsable del Cementerio Municipal de esta ciudad, ha superado los obstaculos de la vida con puro sacrificio y creditos obtenidos.  

Solicita por 4ta vez el apoyo de Kiva a quien agradece desde ya por esta gestion brindada, requiere credito con el objetivo de terminar de levantar las paredes de la casa ya que estan a la midad de concreto y el resto es de madera, lo cual las hara de concreto.  con el credito anterior logró cambiar el techo de su casa y mejorar otros detalles pero aun continua con su meta hasta ver terminada su casa si Dios le presta vida y con su esfuerzo y ayuda de Kiva en estas gestiones, pues su mayor sueño es concluir su vivienda.
texts.en:
Zenayda, 48, is married and has three children. Two of them are grown, and the youngest is in elementary school.  The older ones help her with the household expenses.

Zenayda has been working for the city government of Juigalpa for the last 24 years as a caretaker for the municipal cemetery. She has overcome life's obstacles through pure sacrifice and the loans that she has received.

She is requesting support through Kiva for the fourth time, and she is grateful for the support she has been given.  She needs this loan in order to finish raising the walls of the house.  They are half concrete and the other half is wood.  She will make them all concrete.  

With the previous loan she managed to change the roof of her house and make other improvements.  However, she will continue with her goal until she sees her house completed, if God gives her life and strength, and with the help from Kiva for these improvements.

Her greatest dream is to finish her house.

loans.use: to finish raising the walls of the house and make them all concrete.

loans.name: Si Chan

texts.en:
Si Chan is 58 years old. She is married and resides with her four children in Kratie Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than twenty years earning approximately $6 daily. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) is a construction worker who earns about $12 each day. One of her children is a security guard. He earns about $3 per day.

Because their current house is old, Si Chan is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase construction materials to rebuild her house. By doing so, she will be able to provide comfortable living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to rebuild her house

loans.name: Sonita

texts.en:
Sonita is 27 years old. She is married and lives with her mother in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating agricultural crops for more than four years, earning approximately $6 daily. Her husband is a foreign language teacher who earns about $5 each day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sonita is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase more farmland for cultivating agricultural crops. This purchase will help her expand her business and make more income. In the future, she would like to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more farmland for cultivating agricultural crops

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en: Sokha is 40 years old. She is widowed and blessed with her daughter in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than twenty years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her daughter helps her run the business. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Sokha is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help her reduce their transportation expenses. In the future, she would like to run a pig farm and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Yom

texts.en:
Yom is 60 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in weaving for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her husband is a rice farmer who earns about $1 each day. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $5 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Yom is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the  money  saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a poultry farm and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Makara

texts.en: Makara is 22 years old. He is single and lives with his parents in Takeo Province, Cambodia. He has been working as an electrician for more than two years, earning approximately $3 per day. Due to the difficulty in his family’s transportation, Makara is requesting a loan of $1300 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable him to use the money saved on his transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, he would like to run a poultry farm and rebuild his present house to make it bigger and more convenient for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Chanthy

texts.en:
Chanthy is 26 years old. She is single and lives with her mother in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She is a tailor who earns about $5 daily. Her mother is unemployed; just staying home and receiving support from her daughter. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Chanthy is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the  money saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to build a new house to provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Mouy Kea

texts.en:
Mouy Kea is 59 years old. She is widowed and blessed with two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling grilled chicken for more than ten years, earning approximately $6 daily. One of her children is a construction worker who earns about $3 each day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Mouy Kea is requesting a loan of $1000 as working capital  to purchase more chicken to grill and sell. By doing so, she would be able to make more profit to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her youngest child to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to raise capital to purchase more chicken to grill and sell

loans.name: Seng

texts.en:
Seng is 46 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a rice farmer who earns about $4 daily. Two of her children are construction workers. They earn about $10 each day. 

In order to improve her family's finances, Seng is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase groceries to resell. This money will help her start a new business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor's degrees.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to resell

loans.name: Srey  Mit

texts.en:
Srey Mit is 31 years old. She is married and lives with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been working in garment factory for more than two years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband runs the business of buying cattle to resell. He earns about $6 each day. 

In order to improve her family's finances, Srey Mit is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase more cattle to resell. By doing so, she would earn more profit to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand the business and send her children to a good school. In addition, she plans to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle to resell

loans.name: Sok Lim

texts.en: Sok Lim is married and blessed with one child in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She is a Khmer traditional singer who sings in Cambodian marriage ceremonies. She earns about $5 per day. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) is a barber who earns about $8 each day. Due to the difficulty in her family's transportation, Sok Lim is requesting a loan of $1500 purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would help her reduce the expenses of transportation. In the future, she would like to run her own music band and send her child to school.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Vannak

texts.en:
Vannak is 36 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $5 daily. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $8 each day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Vannak is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the  money saved on her transportation to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she plans to rebuild her house to make it more convenient for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Tot

texts.en:
Tot is 48 years old. She is married and lives with nine children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing agricultural crops for more than twenty years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) is a construction worker who earns about $3 per day. Five of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $20 each day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family's transportation, Tot is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a tailoring shop for her children and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Eim

texts.en:
Eim is 34 years old. She is married and blessed with two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling peanuts and potatoes for more than seven years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is employed at the zoo and earns about $3 per day. 

In order to improve her family's finances, Eim is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase cattle to breed and resell when they gain weight. By doing so, she would earn income to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her children to school. In addition, she plans to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to breed and resell when they gain weight

loans.name: Tom

texts.en:
Tom is 54 years old. She is married and lives with four children in Kampot Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up animals for more than twenty years, earning approximately $8 per day. Her husband (who joins her in the picture) helps her run the business. All of her children are employed by a garment factory. They earn about $10 daily. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Tom is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase a motorbike for her son to run a taxi service. This purchase would enable her son to generate extra income to support the family. In the future, she would like to purchase a car to run a public transportation service.  She would also like to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her son to run a taxi service

loans.name: Lily Del Carmen

texts.es: La Sra. Lily  de 48 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de su mamá, en Juigalpa Chontales, trabaja como Conserje para el BAC-Serlisa desde hace 4 años; es una persona muy activa y con muchas ganas de prosperar. Solicita su 1er credito de mejoras de vivienda para iniciar la construccion de su casa de habitacion, lo que pretende logar poco a poco con creditos para en un tiempo no muy lejano poder tener su hogar propio y mejorar sus condiciones de vida que es su sueño que desde tiempo pasado ha querido cumplir.
texts.en: Lily is 48 years old. She is single, and lives in her mother’s house in Juigalpa Chontales. She has worked as a janitor for BAC-Serlisa for the past four years. She is a very active person, and has lots of desire to get ahead. She is requesting her first housing improvement loan to begin building her own home. She hopes to realize her goal with loans little by little so that in the near future she will be able to have her own home and improve the quality of her life. This has been a dream she has wanted to realize for some time.

loans.use: to build a house.

loans.name: Ken

texts.en:
Ken is 42 years old. He is married and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. He has been working as a construction worker for more than ten years, earning approximately $4 per day. His wife makes brooms to sell and earns about $2 daily. Two of her children are garment workers who earn about $5 each day. 

Due to the difficulty in his family’s transportation, Ken is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable him to use the money saved on his transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, he would like to breed pigs to earn more income to support the family and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, he hopes to build fence around his house.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Lai

texts.en:
Lai is 51 years old. She has been involved in growing agricultural crops for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $3 per day. Three of her children are employed. They earn about $15 each day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Lai is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money saved  on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business of breeding pigs to generate more income to support the family and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Pisey

texts.en:
Pisey is 43 years old. She is married and blessed with two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling food for more than a year, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband runs a taxi service and earns about $6 daily. One of her children is a construction worker who earns about $8 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Pisey is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase rice and utensils to use in her business. This purchase would enable her to expand her business and generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her store and send her youngest child to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase rice and utensils to use in her business

loans.name: Phorn

texts.en:
Phorn is 29 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampot Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than seven years, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband is a motor taxi driver who earns about $8 daily. Because his current motorbike is old, Phorn is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a new motorbike for her husband's taxi service. This purchase would enable her husband to attract more customers and to earn more income to support the family. 

In the future, Phorn would like to run an additional business and send her children to a good school. In addition, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike for her husband to run a taxi service

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, salt and maize flour to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials to make dresses, such as fabric and accessories. :

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es: El señor Oscar habita en el municipio de San Caralampio, junto a su esposa e Hijos han  trabajado la Tierra y se han dedicado al cultivo de Pitahaya en estos momento requiere de Capital para darle mantenimiento a su cultivo ya que por el clima y las plagas las pitahaya estan algo pequeñas y el teme que no pueda venderlas, Con este nuevo financiamiento comprara los insumos necesarios como: Urea, Completo entre otros. Don Oscar se siento muy satisfecho por esta nueva oportunidad que Afodenic mediantes Fondos Kiva le estan brindando con este financiamiento ya que con esta ayuda podra sacar adelante sus pitahaya y sus ingresos mejoraran, feliz nos manifiesta don Oscar la confianza brindada a pequeños agricultores con el.
texts.en: Oscar lives in the town of San Caralampio with his wife and children. They work the land and grow pitaya [dragon fruit]. At this time, he needs capital to do some maintenance on his crop since due to the weather and pests the pitayas are somewhat small and he is afraid he won't be able to sell them. With this new loan, he will buy necessary materials, such as urea and others. Oscar is very satisfied with this new opportunity that Afodenic is offering through the Kiva Fund. They are offering him this loan because with this help he will be able to get his pitaya ahead and his income will improve. Oscar tells us he is happy with the trust given to small farmers such as he is.

loans.use: to buy materials to so maintenance on his pitaya [dragon fruit] crop.

loans.name: Sabougnouma 5 Group

texts.fr:
Les sept membres du groupe  SABOUGNOUMA 5 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 34 ans, 3 enfants et vivant la plupart dans des  familles polygames à   LANFIALA, un des villages de la commune de LOULOUNI dans la préfecture de KADIOLO, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur huitième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
Les spéculations cultivées sont  le riz et l’arachide par FATOUMATA au premier rang à gauche debout sur la photo.
 Avec son prêt, elle compte, acheter des intrants et les semences pour entretenir  0.5 hectare. 
Les productions sont vendues au niveau du village et au marché de LOULOUNI après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 85 000 FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The seven members of the SABOUGNOUMA 5 group are married women with an average age of 34 years old, and having an average of 3 children. Most of them live in polygamous families in LANFIALA, one of the villages in the LOULOUNI commune, in the KADIOLO prefecture, the third largest administrative region in Mali. They work with the micro-finance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, in order to keep their business moving forward during the winter months. They are on their eighth loan with Soro Yiriwaso. The previous loans were all correctly repaid.

FATOUMATA, who is standing on the far left in the photo, grows rice and peanuts. With her loan, she plans to buy inputs and seeds for 0.5 hectares. The harvested crops are sold in villages and at the market in LOULOUNI to a clientele made up of both men and women.

She plans to earn an average profit of 85,000 FCFA per harvest. That profit will allow her to pay off her loan and help her husband cover their daily expenses.

loans.use: to pay labor costs, buy farming inputs and seeds

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is a forty-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His personal goal is to educate his children and build a permanent home. He has been a farmer for five years and he bought the land with his wages that he earned as a causal laborer. He has been facing hardships of unpredictable seasonal weather changes that affect his yields, however, he has a vision of diversifying his business to include a retail shop. George needs the loan to buy tea seedlings for planting.

loans.use: to buy tea seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Eriah

texts.en: Eriah is a thirty-five-year-old married man with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been in the retail shop business for ten years. His hardships are high fuel and transportation costs, and his personal goal is educating his children while his business goal is expanding the business into new markets. Eriah wants money to buy general merchandise such as books, pens and sugar for sale.

loans.use: to buy books, pens and sugar for sale.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Don Mario de 57 años de edad, es un señor muy activo que junto a su esposa e hijos han luchado para salir adelante, se dedica a los trabajos agricolas, y comercializa leche, tiene una parcela en la Colonia Los laureles de donde obtiene sus ingresos para los gastos familiares, desde niño se ha dedicado a esta labor lo cual le enseño su papá y ahora él la pone en practicas.  Solicita su 2do. credito a Afodenic para invertirlo en compra de Vaquillas de vientre para que estas cuando paran les generen mayores ingresos y por ende poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida, Sueña con incrementar su hato ganadero y mantenerse con salud.
texts.en: Mario is 57 years old. He is a very active man who, along with his wife and children, has struggled to get ahead. He is a farmer, and he sells milk. He has a parcel of land in the Los Laureles Colonia which provides him with income to cover his family expenses. He has worked as a farmer since he was a child. His father taught him the trade he now practices. He is requesting his second loan from AFODENIC to invest by purchasing female calves so that when they give birth he can have better income and therefore be able to improve his quality of life. His dream is to increase his herd of livestock and to stay healthy.

loans.use: to purchase female calves.

loans.name: Diego Manuel

texts.es: El sr. Diego de 55 años de edad, es acompañado, su compañera de vida trabaja como domestica, tiene una hija que depende de el. Trabaja en el area de limpieza para la Municipalidad de Juigalpa desde hace 16 años, ha venido luchando con creditos anteriores que le ha dado afodenic mismos que los ha aprovechado para la construccion y remodelacion de su vivienda que con tando sacrificio ha adquirido. Solicita el credito para destinarlos a mejoras de vivienda pues pretende comprar piedras canteras ya que su casa es de madera y zinc y tambien para la  construccion de una letrina, y así mejorar las condiciones de vida y salud de él y su familia de esta forma ver realizados sus sueños.
texts.en: Diego is 55 years old. He lives with his life's companion and she works as a domestic employee. They have a daughter who depends on him. He has worked cleaning for the town of Juigalpa for 16 years. He has been struggling to do construction and remodeling on his house with loans from Afodenic. He acquired his house with a lot of sacrifice. He is asking for the loan to do home improvements. He intends on buying quarry stones because his house is made of wood and zinc. He also is going to build a latrine and in this way improve his quality of life and health for him and his family. This way he can make his dreams come true.

loans.use: to do home improvements.

loans.name: Kyasa Twegate Group

texts.en:
Vicent is a 40-year-old married man with six children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He is a member of this group, where each member guarantees the others in accessing a loan. 

For ten years Vicent has been farming and with the proceeds he has been able to pay school fees for his children. He started as a subsistence farmer but now farms commercially. He has challenges of inadequate capital to buy farm inputs, as well as price fluctuations and inflation.  Vicent wants a loan to buy seedlings for planting. 

Vicent's personal goals are educating his children and building a permanent home while his business goal is hiring employees to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is 41 years old and he is charged with the responsibility of looking after three children whom he lives with in Masindi, Uganda. For one year he has been in the  piggery business. Inadequate capital to purchase feed and other operational costs hinder his business. He would like to educate his children and move his business to a more permanent location. Stephen wants a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a 39-year-old married man with two children living in Masindi, Uganda. For three years, he has been in the produce business and with the proceeds he has been able to provide the basic needs to his family .Inadequate capital to purchase stock is a great threat to his business. His dream is to educate his children up to the university and expand his business into new markets. Patrick wants a loan to buy maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize to sell.

loans.name: Hilda Maria

texts.es:
Doña Hilda sigue laborando en servicios domestico, pues no logro un nivel académico alto, debido a que sus padres era muy sencillos económicamente, cuando se caso contaba con la ayuda económica de su esposo, luego con los años falleció de un infarto, teniendo que apoyar a sus hijos. En la educación y en un mejor techo.
Con ahorros y financiamientos en Afodenic, ha sido posible la mejora a su casa, el cual está muy feliz  al poder tener mejores condiciones de vivienda, con este nuevo préstamo comprara: materiales de construcción, piedra, arena, cemento, hierro, tablas de madera, reguardando mejor su propiedad y mejor seguridad para su familia.
texts.en:
Hilda continues to work as a domestic since she did not reach a high level of academic schooling. Due to the fact that her parents had few economic resources, when she married she depended on her husband’s economic support. He eventually passed away due to a heart attack, which required her to support her children, providing for their education and housing.
Through savings and financing from AFODENIC, she has been able to improve her home. She is very happy to be able to have better housing conditions. With this new loan, she will purchase construction materials, such as stone, sand, cement, iron rebar, and wood boards, which will enable her to protect her property better and to improve her family’s safety.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to begin building a wall in the rear portion of her property.

loans.name: Edson

texts.en:
Edson is a 34-year-old married man with one child living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been a health worker for eleven years. His personal goal is to build a permanent house.  He also intends to set up a clinic in his home area to give his community access to nearby health services.

Edson intends to use the loan to buy building materials for constructing his house.

loans.use: to buy building materials for constructing his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron sheets, cement, brick and nails to finish his house.

loans.name: Hazel Karina

texts.es:
Hazel tiene la edad de 29 años, casada, su esposo labora como responsable de distribución en una empresa privada, se recibió en contabilidad, y trabaja como coordinadora crédito.Todavia no tiene hijo.
Su mama fue quien siempre la apoyo con los estudios, pues tiene un pequeño comedor en donde tiene su clientela, ya que mi papa, desde que se separo de ella, no fue responsable, cuando comencé a trabajar me comencé a comprar mis cosas personales y al apoyo a mi madre, luego para sacar mi título fue a través de un financiamiento, el cual ya cancele, es ahora que comenzare hacer mejora  a mi pequeña casa, al levantar mas las paredes internas para subir el techo, ya que es muy baja y da mucho calor, dejando un techo en mejores condiciones. Materiales a comprar, piedra, bloques, arena, cemento, hierro, tablas y cuartones de madera para comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Hazel is 29 years old and married. Her husband is responsible for distribution at a private business. She has a degree in accounting and works as a credit coordinator. She does not have any children.
Her mother always supported her with her studies. She has a small canteen where she serves customers. When her father separated from her mother, he was not responsible. When Hazel started working, she started to purchase her personal items and to help her mother. When she studied for her degree, it was with a loan which is now cancelled. She now wants to start improving her little house by raising the internal walls more in order to raise the roof. The roof is now very low and makes the house very hot. In order to start the project, she needs to purchase rocks, blocks, sand, cement, iron, planks and timber.

loans.use: purchase construction materials like rock, blocks, etc. in order to  raise the house's internal walls.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is a 33-year-old hardworking man with two children living in Kasese, Uganda.

He has been operating a retail shop for three years. He started with 500,000 shillings and now has 3,500,000 shillings as working capital.

His hardships are price fluctuations and inflation. His personal goal is educating his children while his business goal is diversifying the business to include transport.

Vincent wants money to buy soap and saucepans to sell.

loans.use: to buy soap and sauce pans to sell.

loans.name: Abubakar

texts.en:
Abubakar is a 38-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda.

He has been in the drug shop and clinic business for three years. His hardships are inadequate capital to purchase the necessary drugs, price fluctuations and inflation.

His  personal goals are educating his children and building a permanent home, while his business goals are diversifying his business and expanding it to new markets.

Abubakar wants money to buy drugs and medical equipment for his clinic.

loans.use: to buy drugs and medical equipment for his clinic.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a 24-year-old married man with one child, living in Kagadi, Uganda.

He is a teacher by profession and he has been in practice for a period of two years.

He would like to educate his children up to the university level and also upgrade in his studies as he wishes to become a head teacher some day.

He also deals in produce buying so as to supplement his salary. Richard wants a loan to buy coffee, beans and maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy coffee, beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a 42-year-old married woman with six children, living in Kasese, Uganda.

She has been in a bar business for six years. Her hardship is customers not paying on time.

Her personal goal is educating her children and her business goal is moving her business to more permanent location.

Rose wants money to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Kelvine

texts.en:
Kelvine is a 30-year-old woman with one child, living in Kagadi, Uganda.

She works as a community development officer with a government institution. 

She has a personal goal of acquiring a master's degree and buying land for developments.

Kelvine intends to use the loan to pay fees for completion of post graduate studies.

loans.use: to pay fees for completion of post graduate studies.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is a 45-year-old married man with three children, living in Kagadi, Uganda.

He is a teacher by profession and has been in service 14 years.

He would like to educate each of his three children to attain a degree as a minimum qualification and to buy land for farming.

Vincent intends to use the loan to buy land for crop growing.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Adonia

texts.en: Adonia is a 30-year-old married man with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been selling clothes for four years. His hardships are inadequate capital to purchase stock, high fuel costs, price fluctuation and inflation. His personal goal is to educate his children while his business goal is to own a boutique. Adonia wants a loan to buy clothes and blankets to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes and blankets to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to maintain two acres of pineapples.

loans.name: Lorenzo Juan

texts.es:
El Sr. Lorenzo, de 31 años de edad, habita en el municipio del Rama la RAAS, trabaja en el Inta, desde hace un año, se desempeña como Jornalero. Es soltero, tiene una parsona a cargo, se esfuerza para lograr sus metas y vivir comodo, es una persona responsable, humilde y sencillo. 
Solicita su credito para comprar materiales de construccion y poder hacer un anexo de 3 x6 = 185 mts2 y asi darle una mejor vista a su casa donde habita. 
Desea tener una mejor comodidad en su hogar, pues piensa que cuando cancele este credito solicitar otro financiamiento para ir poco a poco mejorando las condiciones en su hogar.
texts.en:
Sr. Lorenzo, 31, lives in El Rama.  He has worked for a year in El Inta as a day laborer.
He is single and has responsibility for one other person.  He is working to support himself and get ahead.  He is a responsible person, decent and uncomplicated.  
He is applying for a loan that he will use to buy construction materials.  He wants to improve his house by building a 185 square-meter add-on.
He wants to continue improving his house and plans to apply for other loans after he repays this one.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for house improvement project.

loans.name: Yader Henry

texts.es: Yader de 34 años de edad, es soltero, trabaja en su finca ubicada en la comarca Kajinicuil, es una persona muy trabajadora, se dedica a la explotacion de su finca que le heredó su papa produciendo granos basicos, hortalizas y trabaja con ganado en este caso compra y vende Terneros. Solicita este credito para comprar Terneros los cuales engordara para comercializarlos en pie una vez que adquieran el peso necesario y asi poder obener mayor ganancia para sus gastos familiares. Su mayor propósito es salir adelante y prosperar en en este negocio y acondicionar su pequeña finca.
texts.en: Yader is thirty-four years old. He is single, and works on his farm, which is located in the Kajinicuil comarca. He is a very hard-working person. He works on the farm he inherited from his father, producing basic grains and vegetables. He also works with livestock. He currently buys and sells calves. He is requesting this loan to be able to purchase calves to fatten up so he can sell them on the hoof once they attain the required weight, allowing him to obtain more income to cover his family living expenses. His main goal is to get ahead and be prosperous with this business, as well as to fix up his small farm.

loans.use: to purchase calves to raise.

loans.name: Mahmadsharif

texts.ru:
Махмадшариф проживает в городе Куляб. Ему 28 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Жена и мать Махмадшарифа занимаются домашним хозяйством. Сам он более семи лет занимается торговлей. Махмадшариф два года назад открыл собственный продуктовый магазин, где на сегодняшний день работает продавцом. 
Махмадшариф берет кредит для покупки продуктов и хозяйственных товаров с целью увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en:
Mahmadsharif lives in the city of Kulob. He is 28 years old, married, and has two children. His wife and mother take care of their household. Mahmadsharif has been a merchant for over seven years, and two years ago opened his own grocery store where he currently works.

Mahmadsharif is taking this loan to purchase food and household items in order to increase the the volume of his sales.

loans.use: to purchase food products and household items for his shop

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 42-year-old married man with seven children living in Kasese,Uganda. He has been operating a pub for two years. His hardships are high transportation costs, price fluctuations and inflation. His personal goals are to educate his children and build a permanent home, while his business goals are to move his business to a more permanent location and diversify to include farming. Joseph wants money to buy sodas and beers to sell.

loans.use: to buy sodas and beers to sell.

loans.name: Joram

texts.en:
Joram is a 42-year-old hardworking man living in Kagadi, Uganda.

He has been in the produce business for a period of 12 years. He started this business with capital he got from proceeds of maize and beans growing. He says inadequate capital is the factor affecting the business.

He would like to educate his seven children up to university and own a big food store.

Joram wants a loan to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans for sale.

loans.name: Dan

texts.en:
Dan is a 25-year-old man with one child living in Kagadi, Uganda.

For six years he has been trading in a local brew business, locally known as waragi.

He faces a problem of inadequate capital to buy raw materials and customers not paying on time. He would like to move his business to a more permanent location and expand it to other new markets.

Dan wants a loan to buy local brew for sale.

loans.use: to buy local brew for sale.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey is a 44-year-old man with one child living in Kagadi, Uganda.

He has been selling local brew for a period of eight years.

He faces a problem of inadequate capital to facilitate the business and customers not paying on time. He would like to move his business to a more permanent location and expand it to other new markets.

Godfrey intends to use the loan to buy local brew for sale.

loans.use: to buy more local brew for sale.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 38-year-old man with 10 children, living in Kagadi, Uganda.

He deals in a local brew business that he has operated for a period of eight years.

He faces a problem of inadequate capital to facilitate the business and customers not paying on time.

Joseph would like mostly to build a permanent house and educate his children. He would like to move his business to a more permanent location and expand it to other new markets.

Joseph wants a loan to buy local brew for sale.

loans.use: to buy local brew to sell.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 52-year-old married man with eight children living in Kagadi, Uganda. He is a teacher by profession and has been in service for 30 years. He has been able to educate four of his children to university level. In addition to his salary,  he grows pineapples, mangoes and other food crops. He would like to educate his other four children and to buy land. Joseph wants a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: William

texts.en: William is a married man aged 44 years with 3 children living in Kagadi, Uganda. He owns a retail shop that he has run for a period of 3 years. He got capital from farming. He says inadequate capital is affecting the business since he has a wide and ready market. He would like to build a permanent home and educate his children. William wants a loan to buy sugar and salt for sale.

loans.use: to buy sugar and salt for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Candido

texts.es:
El Sr. Candido de 56 años de edad, vive en Muelle de los Bueyes junto a su esposa quien le ayuda en los quehaceres del hogar y sus hijos que al igual que don Candido labran la tierra para obtener la produccion y de esta manera generar los ingresos que le permitan sobre vivir, Candido es un productor y ganadero muy dedicado a su trabajo, responsable honesto y de buenas costumbres. Se ha destacado por ser excelente cliente en sus creditos anteriores.  Solicita el 7mo. credito para compra de insumos necesarios para la preparacion del terreno para sembrar una manzana de yuca, y de esta manera obtener su cosecha en buen estado para comercializarla; con esta inversion lograra tener mejores Ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida.		

Pretende seguir incrementando sus siembras para mejorar los Ingresos, aprovechar la Propiedad y mejorar la economia familiar. Su objetivo es seguir aprovechando al maximo sus recursos ya que posee una extencion de territorio de 70 manzanas las cuales 20 tiene destinadas para cultivo.
texts.en:
Sr. Candido, 56, and his wife live in Muelle de los Bueyes.  His wife takes care of the house and his children, like their father, are farmers.  Candido grows crops and raises livestock to support himself and his family.  He is responsible and reliable.  He has been an excellent client in the past.  He is applying for what will be his 7th loan.  He will use it to buy the supplies that he needs to prepare his land for his next yucca crop.  The investment will provide him with the means to get the very best yield when he harvests the crop for sale.  The better his yield, the better his income and the better able he will be to support his family.	

Candido plans to continue expanding his farming business so that he can increase his income and provide for his family.  His goal is to make the most of his resources.  He owns 70 "manzanas" (a unit of land area) of which 20 will be planted.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his farming business.

loans.name: Rahmat

texts.ru: Рахмат проживает в городе Турсунзаде. Ему 23 года. Он холост, живет с родителями. Рахмат открыл небольшой цех, где печет хлебобулочные изделия для торговли. В этой области он работает уже пять лет. Рахмат просит кредит для приобретения большой духовки.
texts.en:
Rahmat lives in the city of Tursun-zoda. He is 23 years old, single, and lives with his parents. Rahmat has opened a small shop where he bakes bread products for sale. He has been working as a baker for the past five years.

Rahmat is requesting this loan to purchase a large oven.

loans.use: to buy a large oven for his bakery

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a 47-year-old hard-working man living in Kagadi, Uganda. He has been in produce business for 20 years. He started this business with capital from growing maize and beans. He says inadequate capital is the factor currently affecting his business. He would like to educate his eight children and own a food store. James wants a loan to buy maize and beans for sale.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans for sale.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey is a married man with 4 children living in Kagadi, Uganda.  He deals in a bar business that he has run for 10 years. He started with capital from agricultural proceeds.

Inadequate capital is the factor that most affects the business, as he has a wide market. Godfrey would like to educate his children and expand his business to other areas. He wants a loan to buy beer and sodas to sell.

loans.use: to buy beer and sodas to sell.

loans.name: Justus

texts.en: Justus is a 48-year-old hardworking married man living in Kagadi, Uganda. He owns a butcher shop that he has run for a period of 12 years. He specifically sells pork and the business is very profitable. He says price fluctuations and inflation are affecting the business. He would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets. Justus wants a loan to buy pigs for selling in his butcher shop.

loans.use: to buy pigs for selling in his butcher shop.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice is a fifty-year-old married woman with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling poultry feeds for twenty years. Her hardship is inadequate capital to meet the high demand. Her personal goals are educating her children and building a permanent home, while her business goals are diversifying her business to include agriculture and expanding into new markets. Beatrice wants money to buy poultry feed for selling.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed for selling.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a married man with 6 children living in Kagadi, Uganda. For four years he has been dealing in a bar business. He started with capital gotten from agriculture which he still practices. Inadequate capital is the greatest factor affecting his business. He would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets. John wants a loan to buy beer and sodas to sell.

loans.use: to buy beer and sodas to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his banana plantation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase dairy cows

loans.name: Abduhalim

texts.ru: Абдухалим родился 1953 году в районе Хамадони. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Абдухалим хочет купить машину, чтобы заняться своим делом. Сейчас у Абдухалима машина сына, на котором он ездит уже год. Абдухалим просит кредит для приобретения машины, чтобы предоставить услугу на своей собственной машине.
